extendedInfo.description: Clap 2 Answer allows you to answer an incoming call on speaker mode just by clapping.Have you ever been in a situation where you canât or don't want to answer an incoming call because the phone is out of reach? Clap 2 Answer provides you the solution.  The app is design to work just like The Clapper and answer your call by merely clapping your hands twice or thrice.It provides adjustable sensibility to work on a wide range of environments.For more convenience, the app also includes a caller id readout option that allows you to hear who is calling before answering the call.***********This is a trial version, which has a time limit of 3 hours.  After which you can re-enable the functionality or buy the full version to remove the time limit. ***********Send us your feedback: creativesoftwaresolutions1@gmail.com
